description: Geocodes free-form text, such as an address, name, city, or region to allow you to search for Places or points of interest. Optional parameters let you narrow your search results by bounding box or country, or bias your search toward a specific position on the globe. Search results are returned in order of highest to lowest relevance.

parameters.name: IndexName
parameters.description: The name of the place index resource you want to use for the search.

parameters.name: Text
parameters.description: The address, name, city, or region to be used in the search in free-form text format. For example, 123 Any Street.

parameters.name: BiasPosition
parameters.description: An optional parameter that indicates a preference for places that are closer to a specified position. If provided, this parameter must contain a pair of numbers. The first number represents the X coordinate, or longitude; the second number represents the Y coordinate, or latitude. For example, [-123.1174, 49.2847] represents the position with longitude -123.1174 and latitude 49.2847. (float) ---

parameters.name: FilterBBox
parameters.description: An optional parameter that limits the search results by returning only places that are within the provided bounding box. If provided, this parameter must contain a total of four consecutive numbers in two pairs. The first pair of numbers represents the X and Y coordinates (longitude and latitude, respectively) of the southwest corner of the bounding box; the second pair of numbers represents the X and Y coordinates (longitude and latitude, respectively) of the northeast corner of the bounding box. For example, [-12.7935, -37.4835, -12.0684, -36.9542] represents a bounding box where the southwest corner has longitude -12.7935 and latitude -37.4835, and the northeast corner has longitude -12.0684 and latitude -36.9542. (float) ---

parameters.name: FilterCountries
parameters.description: An optional parameter that limits the search results by returning only places that are in a specified list of countries. Valid values include ISO 3166 3-digit country codes. For example, Australia uses three upper-case characters: AUS. (string) ---

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: An optional parameter. The maximum number of results returned per request. The default: 50

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: The preferred language used to return results. The value must be a valid BCP 47 language tag, for example, en for English. This setting affects the languages used in the results, but not the results themselves. If no language is specified, or not supported for a particular result, the partner automatically chooses a language for the result. For an example, we'll use the Greek language. You search for Athens, Greece, with the language parameter set to en. The result found will most likely be returned as Athens. If you set the language parameter to el, for Greek, then the result found will more likely be returned as ÎÎ¸Î®Î½Î±. If the data provider does not have a value for Greek, the result will be in a language that the provider does support.

parameters.name: FilterCategories
parameters.description: A list of one or more Amazon Location categories to filter the returned places. If you include more than one category, the results will include results that match any of the categories listed. For more information about using categories, including a list of Amazon Location categories, see Categories and filtering, in the Amazon Location Service Developer Guide. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The search text specified in the request.

nested_items.name: BiasPosition
nested_items.description: Contains the coordinates for the optional bias position specified in the request.
(float) ---

nested_items.name: FilterBBox
nested_items.description: Contains the coordinates for the optional bounding box specified in the request.
(float) ---

nested_items.name: FilterCountries
nested_items.description: Contains the optional country filter specified in the request.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: MaxResults
nested_items.description: Contains the optional result count limit specified in the request.

nested_items.name: ResultBBox
nested_items.description: The bounding box that fully contains all search results.
(float) ---

nested_items.name: DataSource
nested_items.description: The geospatial data provider attached to the place index resource specified in the request. Values can be one of the following:
Esri.
Grab.
Here.

nested_items.name: Language
nested_items.description: The preferred language used to return results. Matches the language in the request. The value is a valid BCP 47 language tag, for example, en for English.

nested_items.name: FilterCategories
nested_items.description: The optional category filter specified in the request.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Results
nested_items.description: A list of Places matching the input text. Each result contains additional information about the specific point of interest.

nested_items.name: Label
nested_items.description: The full name and address of the point of interest such as a city, region, or country. For example, 123 Any Street, Any Town, USA.

nested_items.name: Point
nested_items.description: A single point geometry specifies a location for a Place using WGS 84 coordinates:
x -- Specifies the x coordinate or longitude.
y -- Specifies the y coordinate or latitude.

nested_items.name: AddressNumber
nested_items.description: The numerical portion of an address, such as a building number.

nested_items.name: Street
nested_items.description: The name for a street or a road to identify a location. For example, Main Street.

nested_items.name: Neighborhood
nested_items.description: The name of a community district. For example, Downtown.

nested_items.name: Municipality
nested_items.description: A name for a local area, such as a city or town name. For example, Toronto.

nested_items.name: SubRegion
nested_items.description: A county, or an area that's part of a larger region. For example, Metro Vancouver.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: A name for an area or geographical division, such as a province or state name. For example, British Columbia.

nested_items.name: Country
nested_items.description: A country/region specified using ISO 3166 3-digit country/region code. For example, CAN.

nested_items.name: PostalCode
nested_items.description: A group of numbers and letters in a country-specific format, which accompanies the address for the purpose of identifying a location.

nested_items.name: Interpolated
nested_items.description: True if the result is interpolated from other known places.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the time zone, following the IANA time zone standard. For example, America/Los_Angeles.

nested_items.name: Offset
nested_items.description: The time zone's offset, in seconds, from UTC.

nested_items.name: UnitType
nested_items.description: For addresses with a UnitNumber, the type of unit. For example, Apartment.

nested_items.name: UnitNumber
nested_items.description: For addresses with multiple units, the unit identifier. Can include numbers and letters, for example 3B or Unit 123.

nested_items.name: Categories
nested_items.description: The Amazon Location categories that describe this Place.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SupplementalCategories
nested_items.description: Categories from the data provider that describe the Place that are not mapped to any Amazon Location categories.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SubMunicipality
nested_items.description: An area that's part of a larger municipality. For example, Blissville is a submunicipality in the Queen County in New York.

nested_items.name: Distance
nested_items.description: The distance in meters of a great-circle arc between the bias position specified and the result. Distance will be returned only if a bias position was specified in the query.

nested_items.name: Relevance
nested_items.description: The relative confidence in the match for a result among the results returned. For example, if more fields for an address match (including house number, street, city, country/region, and postal code), the relevance score is closer to 1.

nested_items.name: PlaceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the place. You can use this with the GetPlace operation to find the place again later.
